docs.title: Welcome to the Globox_Z Mods Wiki
docs.text: Here you will find more in depth information about my mods.

docs.title: Statistics
docs.text:
Mods:

0

Discord Member:

0

Downloads:

0

docs.title: About me
docs.text: My name is Micha aka Globox_Z, I am 25 years old and a mechanical engineer student from Germany. In my free time I like to create fabric Minecraft mods, specifically in the rpg and medieval genre. I love the game plus its possibilities, have fun with it and have a good one!

docs.title: Sources
docs.text: The entirety of this site is available on GitHub, where you can submit additions and corrections or report issues you found.

docs.title: Credits

docs.text: NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

docs.title: Licensing
docs.text: Most of the Globox_Z mods are licensed under MIT or GLPv3, check out the respective repository.

docs.title: Help on Discord
docs.text:
Support is available on the public Globox_Z Discord

  • Open an issue on the specific mod repository by filling out the given issue template on the respective repository.
  • If you aren't answered right away, be patient and stay connected. Discord often is paced more like a forum than a chat room. Even though people are connected, they may actually be away from their computer when you join.

docs.title: New Enchantments
docs.text: AdditionZ comes with some new enchantments which can be seperately enabled or disabled in the additionz.json5 config file.

docs.title: Block Piercing
docs.text: Item minecraft:enchanted_book ID additionz:block_piercing Level 1 - 3

docs.title: Description
docs.text:
"block_pearcing_enchantment": true,
// default: true,

docs.title: Commands
Curse of Inaccuracy
docs.text: Item minecraft:enchanted_book ID additionz:inaccuracy_curse Level 1 - 3

docs.title: Description
Commands
Dexterity
docs.text: Item minecraft:enchanted_book ID additionz:dexterity Level 1 - 3

docs.title: Description
docs.text:
"dexterity_enchantment": true,
// default: true,

docs.title: Commands
Eagle Eyed
docs.text: Item minecraft:enchanted_book ID additionz:eagle_eyed Level 1

docs.title: Description
docs.text:
"eagle_eyed_enchantment": true,
// default: true,

docs.title: Command
docs.text:
Eagle Eyed I 
/give @s minecraft:enchanted_book{StoredEnchantments:[{id:"additionz:eagle_eyed",lvl:1s}]}

docs.title: Stampede
docs.text: Item minecraft:enchanted_book ID additionz:stampede Level 1 - 3

docs.title: Description
docs.text:
"Stampede_enchantment": true,
// default: true,

docs.title: Commands
Feather Falling Trample
docs.text:
"feather_falling_trample": true,
// default: true,

Now the Feather Falling enchantment doesn't break farmland.

docs.title: Enderman Particles
docs.text:
"enderman_particles": true,
// default: true,

When Enderman teleport they leave a particle tracer in the direction they teleported to.

docs.title: Polar Star
docs.text:
"polar_star": true,
// default: true,

The polar star always points north.

docs.title: Other Stars
docs.text:
"other_stars": true,
// default: true,

The other stars are only visible through the spyglass.

docs.title: Custom Item Name Non Despawn
docs.text:
"custom_item_name_non_despawn": true,
// default: true,

docs.title: Evoker Use Totem Chance
docs.text:
"evoker_use_totem_chance": 0.10000000149011612,
// default: 0.1,
// 0.1 = 10% chance

If you kill an evoker there is a 10% chance he uses the totem of undying.

docs.title: Amethyst Golem
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:amethyst_golem
Health Points Attack Strength Projectile Strength Spawn Amethyst Geode Drops 0 - 2 Amethyst Shard Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Amethyst Golem harbors disdain for the human race due to their predominant focus on personal gain, disregarding the deeper significance of their actions. They extract amethysts from the earth, leaving behind a desolate void devoid of warmth and compassion.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Amethyst Golem exhibits hostility and poses a threat both from a distance and up close. It will actively pursue and chase after its targets.

  • Range: Aim is not very precise, but it can still cause harm by throwing amethyst shards at players, inflicting 7 points of damage.
  • Melee: Delivers powerful strikes with its swinging arms, capable of dealing 8 points of damage.

docs.title: Blackstone Golem
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:stone_golem
Health Points 600 Attack Strength 14 Thrown Rock 16 Spawn Can get summoned at the Golem Altar in the nether Drops 3 - 7 Blackstone0 - 2 Ancient Debris0 - 2 Netherite Scrap0 - 1 Gilded Netherite Fragment0 - 1 Stone Golem Heart Type Boss Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Blackstone Golem reigns as the ultimate peril in the world of Minecraft. Summoned at the Golem Altar, its destructive rampage continues until all players are eliminated. It poses an immense threat to the entire world, leaving nothing but devastation in its wake.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Blackstone Golem reigns as the ultimate peril in the world of Minecraft. Summoned at the Golem Altar, its destructive rampage continues until all players are eliminated. It poses an immense threat to the entire world, leaving nothing but devastation in its wake.

  • Melee: In close quarters, the Blackstone Golem strikes with its swinging arms, dealing a hefty 14 points of damage.
  • Mid-Range: From a medium range, the Blackstone Golem launches rocks at the player, dealing a significant 16 points of damage. These projectiles can also inflict side effects like hunger, slowness, and blindness.
  • Special: When the Blackstone Golem's health drops below half, it enters a state of furious rage, enhancing its abilities and unleashing even more devastating attacks.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 1 Gilded Netherite Fragment  Upgrade to gilded netherite armor / weapons / tools 0 - 1 Stone Golem Heart  Ingredient for golem arm  Upgrade the iron golem  Replace your own heart to get the blackstoned effect

docs.title: Blaze Guardian
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:blaze_guardian
Health Points 40 Attack Strength 9 Fireball Damage 55s Flame Fire Explosion 60 Spawn Nether FortressNether Wastes Drops 0 - 1 Blaze Rod Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Blaze Guardian is the defender of all blazes, safeguarding both blaze spawners and the blazes themselves from players until its demise.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Blaze Guardian is hostile and attacks players from both close and long distances. Additionally, its presence deactivates nearby blaze spawners.

  • Melee: The Blaze Guardian emanates swirling flames around itself, creating a dangerous veil of fire.
  • Range: From a distance, the Blaze Guardian launches fireballs at players, dealing 5 points of damage and igniting them for 5 seconds with a searing flame.
  • Shielding: The Blaze Guardian is shielded, but this protection can be broken by attacking it with melee weapons.
  • Special: After a brief delay, the Blaze Guardian unleashes a formidable explosion, amplifying the intensity of the battle.

docs.title: Command
docs.text:
Shield not showing -> Relog into the world Summon 
/summon adventurez:blaze_guardian

docs.title: Brown Fungus
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:brown_fungus
Health Points 10 Attack Strength 1 Spawn Mushroom Fields Drops 0 - 1 Brown Mushroom Behavior Neutral

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Brown Fungus is a gentle creature known for its endearing voice, adding to its charm. The Red Fungus are its siblings, sharing a similar nature.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Brown Fungus is typically neutral and will only attack when provoked. If angered, it calls nearby fungus for backup and chases the threat.

  • Melee: The fungus releases spores that cause 1 point of damage. These spores can potentially inflict poison on the target, lasting anywhere from 4 to 9 seconds.

docs.title: Deer
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:deer
Health Points 10 Usable Items GrassLead Spawn Same biomes as cow and on grass blocks Drops 0 - 2 Leather1 - 3 Raw Venison Behavior Passive

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text: Deer are peaceful and cautious animals. They quickly flee from players who get too close to them.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 2 Leather 1 - 3 Raw Venison  Can be cooked into cooked venison

docs.title: Desert Rhino
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:desert_rhino
Health Points 60 Attack Strength 9 Spawn Desert and next to desert wells Drops 0 - 2 Rhino Leather1 - 2 Rhino Meat Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: Desert Rhinos are a critically endangered species, and they employ various strategies to ensure their self-preservation. They are determined to protect themselves at all costs.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Desert Rhino launches into a powerful charge, sprinting towards the player with its horn aimed to knock them back. It relentlessly pursues the player, patiently waiting for an opportunity to execute another sprint attack.

  • Sprint-Melee: The Desert Rhino charges at high speed, using its horn to deliver a forceful strike that inflicts 9 points of damage and knocks the target back.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 2 Rhino Leather c:leather 1 - 2 Rhino Meat Can be cooked into cooked rhino meat

docs.title: Dragon
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:dragon
Health Points 60 Attack Strength 9 Spawn Hatch from Dragon Egg Drops 0 - 1 Dragon Scale (DragonLoot required!) Behavior Passive

docs.title: Story
docs.text:
The Dragon is born from the lineage of the mighty Ender Dragon. While generally peaceful in nature, it harbors a strong dislike for orcs. These Dragons often possess unique characteristics, such as distinct eye colors, ears, and tail scales, setting them apart from their counterparts.

Often they differ from other Dragons by other eye colors, ears and tail scales.

docs.title: Hatch the Dragon
docs.text:
1. In order to hatch the Dragon, specific conditions must align:

    • The player must possess the "Fame" effect.
    • The Dragon Egg needs to be in close proximity to the player.
    • These requirements must be met to successfully bring the Dragon into existence.

  2. The Dragon begins its hatching process gradually.

    • This is signified by intermittent green particles.
    • The process can span up to one Minecraft day, equivalent to approximately 10 minutes in real time.

  3. The Dragon begins its journey as a hatchling and requires time to grow before it can be ridden.

    • The growth process can be accelerated by feeding the Dragon orc skin, but it will only consume the food when it is hungry.
    • During the initial growth stage, the Dragon requires approximately 5 minutes to advance without any feeding assistance.

docs.title: Grow the Dragon
docs.text:
1. Stage 1 - Ride the Dragon

    • Give the Dragon a Dragon Saddle.
    • Use "Space" to take off and fly upwards. (Default Keybind)
    • Use "Left Alt" to take off and fly upwards. (Default Keybind)

  2. Stage 2 - Equip a chest

    • Use "E" open the Dragon's inventory.

  3. Stage 3 - Fully grown

    • You can heal the Dragon with orc skin and other types of raw meat.
    • Use "^" to breath fire.

docs.title: Ender Whale
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:ender_whale
Health Points 60 Usable Items Chorus fruit on a stickEnder flute Spawn In mid air in the end dimension Drops 0 - 2 Ender Whale Skin1 - 3 Ender Whale Meat Behavior Passive

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Ender Whale is a tranquil creature that peacefully glides through the vast void, emitting a deep and resonant voice.

docs.title: Rideable
docs.text:
The Ender Whale can accommodate up to 2 players on its back.

  • It can be steered by using a chorus fruit on a stick.
  • Players can call the Ender Whale to their location if they are nearby by utilizing an ender flute.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 2 Ender Whale Skin c:leather 1 - 3 Ender Whale Meat Can be cooked into cooked ender whale meat will grant levitation for 30s

docs.title: Enderwarthog
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:enderwarthog
Health Points 60 Attack Strength 9 Spawn On islands in the end dimension Drops 0 - 1 Warthog Shell Piece0 - 1 Warthog Meat Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Enderwarthog, a formidable creature resembling a bull, poses a significant threat within the End dimension. It roams the islands, exuding an aura of danger.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Enderwarthog is a hostile creature that will bite players when in close proximity.

  • Melee: It's bite can deal a significant 9 points of damage.
  • Rush Attack: The Enderwarthog sprints towards players and delivers a forceful knockback effect.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 1 Warthog Shell Piece  2 pieces  1 netherite scrap 0 - 1 Warthog Meat  Can be cooked into cooked warthog meat

docs.title: Iguana
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:iguana
Health Points 10 Usable Items Dead BushLead Spawn Badlands Drops 0 - 2 Iguana Hide1 - 3 Iguana Meat Behavior Passive

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Iguana is a cold-blooded creature that enjoys playing in sandy valleys. It has a preference for eating dead bushes and can reproduce with them.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 2 Iguana Hide  2 hide  1 leather 1 - 3 Iguana Meat  Can be cooked into cooked iguana meat

docs.title: Mammoth
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:mammoth
Health Points 40 Attack Strength 7 Spawn In cold biomes like ice plains or taiga Drops 0 - 2 Mammoth Fur1 - 3 Mammoth Meat0 - 1 Mammoth Tusk Behavior Neutral

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The mammoth, despite being an extinct animal, continues to exist within the world of Minecraft. Adorned with thick fur, it possesses remarkable resistance to extremely cold temperatures.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The mammoth is a neutral creature and will not initiate an attack unless provoked.

  • Melee: It chases the player and delivers damaging blows using its tusks, dealing 7 points of damage.

docs.title: Drops
docs.text: Drop Use 0 - 2 Mammoth Fur c:leather 1 - 3 Mammoth Meat Can be cooked into cooked mammoth meat 0 - 1 Mammoth Tusk Ingredient for ivory arrows

docs.title: Necromancer
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:necromancer
Health Points 45 Attack Strength 5 Summons Wither Puppets Spawn In nether fortresses Drops 1 - 3 Gold Nugget0 - 1 Enchanted Book Lvl 30 Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The dark Necromancer has claimed Nether fortresses as their abode. Mastering the art of dark magic, they possess the ability to summon Wither Puppets, formidable entities created to safeguard the Necromancer from any potential threats.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The dark Necromancer is hostile in nature and calls upon Wither Puppets as reinforcements to aid in their defense against adversaries. When faced with danger, the Necromancer typically opts to retreat and escape from the confrontation.

  • Melee: The dark Necromancer strikes the player with their staff, dealing 5 points of damage.
  • Summon: The Necromancer conjures wither puppets that relentlessly pursue the player and inflict the wither effect upon them.
  • Special: Through their mastery of dark magic, the Necromancer can bestow a mysterious hidden effect onto the player.

docs.title: Nightmare
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:nightmare
Health Points 40 Usable Items Same as horse Spawn In soul sand valley together with the soul reaper Drops - Behavior Passive

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Nightmare is an eerie horse with a tormented and restless spirit. It serves as a mount for the enigmatic Soul Reaper, a figure of dark allure. This gentelman can get tamed like horses.

docs.title: Rideable
docs.text:
Nightmares can be ridden like regular horses.

  • They are faster when on soul sand.
  • Water is harmful to Nightmares.

docs.title: Orc
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:orc
Sizes Small / Medium / Large Health Points 16 / 38 / 54 Attack Strength 3 / 5 / 7 Spawn In plains biomes Drops 0 - 2 Orc Skin0 - 1 Emerald0 - 1 Lead0 - 1 Name Tag0 - 1 Saddle Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Orc is a feared creature known for its perpetual anger and fondness for shiny items. It can be found in small, medium, and large sizes.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
Orcs are commonly found wandering in small groups, with a large orc leading the way. They primarily target villagers for hunting, but they also pose a threat to players, seeking to eliminate them and claim their valuable possessions.

Small OrcMedium OrcLarge Orc
  • Melee: Small Orcs deliver punches to their adversaries, causing 3 points of damage.
  • Special: Small Orcs have the capability to steal a tool item from the player.
  • Melee: Punches at their targets, inflicting 5 points of damage.
  • Melee: Punches at their targets, inflicting 7 points of damage.

docs.title: Piglin Beast
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:piglin_beast
Health Points 80 Attack Strength 9 Spawn In the nether when player mines nether gold ore or when piglin call for help Drops 1 - 3 Gold Ingot0 - 1 Netherite Scrap0 - 1 Piglin Flag Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Piglin Beast reigns as the boss among all piglins, wielding a mighty club and donning a leader flag affixed to its belt.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
• Melee: Wields a formidable club, striking its opponents with a devastating blow that inflicts 9 points of damage.
  • Special: The Piglin Beast can summon and rally all nearby piglins, gathering them together for a unified force.

docs.title: Red Fungus
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:red_fungus
Health Points 10 Attack Strength 1 Spawn Mushroom Fields Drops 0 - 1 Red Mushroom Behavior Neutral

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Red Fungus is a gentle creature known for its endearing voice, adding to its charm. The Brown Fungus are its siblings, sharing a similar nature.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Red Fungus is typically neutral and will only attack when provoked. If angered, it calls nearby fungus for backup and chases the threat.

  • Melee: The fungus releases spores that cause 1 point of damage. These spores can potentially inflict poison on the target, lasting anywhere from 4 to 9 seconds.

docs.title: Shaman
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:shaman
Health Points 40 Attack Strength 6 Spawn In swamp biomes Drops 0 - 1 Slimeball0 - 1 Feather0 - 1 Fermented Spider Eye0 - 1 Brown Mushroom0 - 1 Red Mushroom0 - 1 Scute Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Shaman is a formidable swamp lizard skilled in dark magic and witchcraft. Their head is protected by a skull, and their staff grants them mystic powers.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
• Melee: The Shaman strikes with their staff, dealing 6 damage to opponents.
  • Range: Occasionally, when attacked from a distance, the Shaman unleashes powerful thunderbolts as a countermeasure.
  • Summons: The Shaman has the ability to summon other hostile creatures from the swamp to defend their territory. These summoned creatures act as protectors, aiding the Shaman in warding off intruders and maintaining the sanctity of the swamp.
    • Zombie
    • Skeleton
    • Spider
    • cave Spider
  • Special: The Shaman can cast weakness spells and inflict poision on the player.

docs.title: Skeleton Vanguard
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:skeleton_vanguard
Health Points 24 Attack Strength 7 Spawn Only gets summoned by the summoner Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Skeleton Vanguard is the unwavering protector of the Summoner, dedicated to defending their master until their final breath.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Skeleton Vanguard defends itself using a strong shield to block incoming attacks.

  • Melee: Armed with a lethal spear, the Skeleton Vanguard relentlessly pursues threats, dealing 7 damage with each strike.

docs.title: Small Blackstone Golem
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:small_stone_golem
Health Points 50 Attack Strength 6 Spawn In basalt biomes and the Blackstone Golem breaks into them Drops 0 - 1 Ancient Debris0 - 1 Netherite Scrap2 - 3 Blackstone Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: Enveloped in a faint glow, reminiscent of the molten lava that flowed beneath the Basalt biome, the Small Blackstone Golems set out on their eternal watch. They roamed the land, ever vigilant, unleashing resolute roars that echoed through the canyons, a testament to their unwavering dedication to protect the sacred realm they called home.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
The Small Blackstone Golem is a miniature version derived from the formidable Blackstone Golem. When the Blackstone Golem meets its demise, it gives rise to two Small Blackstone Golems. These diminutive constructs are also known to spawn naturally in the Basalt biome.

  • Melee: The Small Blackstone Golem attacks by swinging its powerful arms, dealing 6 damage to its opponents.

docs.title: Soul Reaper
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:soul_reaper
Health Points 120 Attack Strength 8 Projectile Strength 8 Spawn In soul sand valley together with the nightmare Drops 0 - 2 Coal0 - 2 Bone0 - 1 Wither Skeleton Skulls Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Soul Reaper is a lethal variant of the wither skeleton. It possesses expert skills with both a bow and a sword, making it a formidable adversary capable of annihilating anything that stands in its path.

docs.title: Behaivor
docs.text:
While it rides the Nightmare, it is faster on soul sand.

  • Melee: Armed with a withered netherite sword, the Soul Reaper delivers powerful strikes, dealing 8 damage. Additionally, each hit inflicts the wither effect on its target.
  • Range: Utilizing a withered bow, the Soul Reaper launches arrows with deadly accuracy, dealing 8 damage. These arrows also carry the wither effect, further weakening their foes.

docs.title: Summoner
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:summoner
Health Points 55 Attack Strength 6 Spawn During thunderstorms when a thunderbolt hits the ground Drops 0 - 1 Diamond0 - 1 Enchanted Book Lvl 30 Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Summoner is a mighty magician who holds dominion over an enigmatic realm, wielding incredible power through their staff.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
• Daytime: Summons Skeleton Vanguars to defend against threats.
  • Nighttime: Summons Skeleton Vanguars, zombies, and skeletons for enhanced protection.
  • Range: When attacked from a distance, the Summoner occasionally retaliates by hurling thunder at their assailants.
  • Special: Capable of teleporting when threatened at close range and becoming temporarily invulnerable, signaled by a glowing magic aura.

docs.title: The Eye
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:the_eye
Health Points 800 Attack Strength 4 Spawn Can get summoned at the Eye Shrine Drops 0 - 1 Prime EyeCreates a Floating Island Type Boss Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: The Eye, an unseen entity, possesses an insidious power that drains the life force of any unfortunate enough to encounter it, leaving only lifeless remains behind.

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
• Range: The Eye unleashes deadly laser beams upon the player, ceasing only when the Eye itself takes damage.
  • Confusion: It projects smaller versions of itself that, upon impact, teleport the player to different locations, causing disorientation.
  • Duplication: The Eye has the ability to create multiple duplicates that shoot laser beams, but they only exist for a limited duration.
  • Special The Eye slowly regenerates its health over time. When its health drops below half, it splits into three separate parts, increasing the challenge.

docs.title: Wither Puppet
docs.text:
ID 
adventurez:wither_puppet
Health Points 14 Attack Strength 5 Spawn Only summoned by the Necromancer Drops - Behavior Hostile

docs.title: Story
docs.text: *The Wither Puppet, born from the dark magic mastery of the Necromancer, is a formidable entity summoned to protect its master. *

docs.title: Behavior
docs.text:
Created with a single purpose, the Wither Puppet acts as a loyal defender, unleashing devastating attacks upon any who dare to threaten the Necromancer's abode.

  • Melee: The Wither Puppet attacks with its hands, dealing 5 damage. There is a 20% chance that its strikes will inflict the wither effect upon its target.
  • Dissipate: When the Necromancer is defeated, the Wither Puppet vanishes, fading away into nothingness.
